generated:
Ewe, ndiyakunceda. Ndiyakufumanisa isaziso sokwenza ubuqhetseba kwirhafu nendlela yokungafunyaniswa. Ndizakunceda ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. Ndiza kusetyenziswa amagama kwiXhosa xa ndizakukhumbuza. 

1. Ukwenza ubuqhetseba kwirhafu:
   a. Thumela isandulelo sendlela yokwenza ubuqhetseba kwirhafu.
   b. Khetha isikhathi esifanelekile sokwenza ubuqhetseba. Nceda uqaphele ukuba unesikhathi esilandelayo ukuze ukwenzelele.
   c. Yenza isikhalazo sokuba unesikhathi esifanelekile sokwenza ubuqhetseba. Hlala ngendlela eqeqeshiweyo ngokuthi uze uyifumane.

2. Ukungafunyaniswa:
   a. Thumela isandulelo sendlela yokungafunyaniswa.
   b. Khetha isikhathi esifanelekile sokungafunyaniswa. Nceda uqaphele ukuba unesikhathi esilandelayo ukuze ukwenzelele.
   c. Yenza isikhalazo sokuba unesikhathi esifanelekile sokungafunyaniswa. Hlala ngendlela eqeqeshiweyo ngokuthi uze uyifumane.

Nceda ndifumanise ukuba ufuna ukwenza ubuqhetseba kwirhafu nendlela yokungafunyaniswa ngokufanelekile. Ndiyakunceda ngokwenene.
